The following statement contains a magic number: foreach (var q in queries) // may want to run these in parallel for perf              {                  var diagnosisTotal = FetchTotalFromESFor(q);                  var monthTotal = monthlyTotals[q.Month];                  var percent = monthTotal == 0 ? 0 : ((decimal)diagnosisTotal / monthTotal) * 100;                    yield return new DiagnosisSummary                  {                      Amount = diagnosisTotal'                      DiagnosisName = GetDiagnosisName(q.DiagnosisId)'                      Month = q.Month'                      Percentage = percent'                      MonthString = q.Month.ToString("yyyy/MM")                  };              }
